bacci.giovanni.biogiova.multialignment.scoring

Interface ScoreMatrix

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoadedScoreMatrix

    public interface ScoreMatrix
    Interface for Score Matrix.
    Author:
    Giovanni Bacci

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getScore(char a, char b)
      Method to calculate the score between the two character.
      SequencesType getType()
      This method should return the type of alphabet of the matrix.

    • Method Detail

      • getScore

        double getScore(char a,
              char b)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Method to calculate the score between the two character. Implementations of this method have to be not case sensitive. If one or both characters are not present in the alphabet of the matrix this method should throw an IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        a - first Character
        b - second Character
        Returns:
        the score
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if at the method has been passed an illegal Character

      • getType

        SequencesType getType()
        This method should return the type of alphabet of the matrix.
        Returns:
        the alphabet of the matrix, see SequencesType
